    • Uses of Task in org.tantalum

      Subclasses of Task in org.tantalum 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsyncTask
      An implementation of Android's AsyncTask pattern for cross platform application on J2ME and Android.
      class  UITask
      A unit of work which, once the Task.doInBackground() is completed on a background Worker thread, should update the user interface from the UI Thread in onPostExecute().
      Fields in org.tantalum declared as Task 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Task Task.chainedTask
      The next Task to be executed after this Task completes successfully.
      Methods in org.tantalum that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task Task.chain(Task nextTask)
      Add a Task (or UITAsk, etc) which will run immediately after the present Task and on the same Worker thread.
      Task Task.fork()
      Execute this task asynchronously on a Worker thread.
      Task Task.fork(int priority)
      Execute this task asynchronously on a Worker thread at the specified priority.
      Methods in org.tantalum with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task Task.chain(Task nextTask)
      Add a Task (or UITAsk, etc) which will run immediately after the present Task and on the same Worker thread.
      static void Task.joinAll(Task[] tasks, long timeout)
      Wait up to a maximum specified timeout for all tasks in the list to complete execution.
      static void Task.joinAllUI(Task[] tasks, long timeout)
      Wait up to a maximum specified timeout for all tasks in the list to complete execution including any follow up tasks on the UI thread.

    • Uses of Task in org.tantalum.net

      Subclasses of Task in org.tantalum.net 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpGetter
      GET something from a URL on the Worker thread Implement Runnable if you want to automatically update the UI on the EDT after the GET completes
      class  HttpPoster
      HTTP POST a message to a given URL
      class  StaticWebCache.GetAnywhereTask
      This Task performs a StaticWebCache.GET_ANYWHERE operation on a Worker thread in the background.
      class  StaticWebCache.GetWebTask
      This Task performs a StaticWebCache.GET_WEB operation on a Worker thread in the background.

      Retrieve one item from the cache using the method specified in the getType parameter.

      Get without the HTTP POST option (HTTP GET only)
